entities.description: Feeling anxious as an alcohol withdrawal symptom in the past 12 months.
Usage of alcohol or other drugs to get over or avoid having alcohol withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Avoiding using alcohol or drugs to get over or avoid alcohol withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Usage of prescription sedatives, tranquilizers, sleeping pills, or downers to avoid alcohol withdrawal symptoms in the past 12 months.
Various options indicating the respondent's answer, such as 'Yes', 'No', 'Never used alcohol', 'Blank', 'Refused', etc.

relationships.description: Indicates experiencing the anxiety symptom as part of alcohol withdrawal.
Indicates the respondent used alcohol or another drug to avoid alcohol withdrawal symptoms.
Indicates the respondent avoided using alcohol or drugs to get over or avoid withdrawal symptoms.
Indicates the respondent used prescription sedatives, tranquilizers, sleeping pills, or downers to avoid alcohol withdrawal symptoms.
The survey question's response options recorded for various scenarios like 'Yes', 'No', 'Never used alcohol', 'Don't know', etc.
